statements: DELETE FROM elected_officials WHERE government_level = 'State' AND position = 'Governor';
DELETE FROM elected_officials WHERE position = 'Senator' AND government_level = 'National';
DELETE FROM officials WHERE id = 1 AND level = 'High';
DELETE FROM government_positions WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM government_positions WHERE position_name = 'Senator');
DELETE FROM state_officials WHERE state = 'New York';
DELETE FROM federal_officials WHERE state = 'California' AND position = 'Senator';
